# NSViewAnimation.EffectName

**Structure**

The following constants specify the animation effect to apply and are used as values for the animation effect property of the animation view. See the description of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/Key/effect] for usage details.

## Declaration

```swift
struct EffectName
```

## Effect Names

- **fadeIn**: Specifies a fade-in type of effect.
- **fadeOut**: Specifies a fade-out type of effect.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting and setting view-animation dictionaries

- **viewAnimations**: The dictionaries defining the objects to animate.
- **NSViewAnimation.Key**: The following string constants are keys for the dictionaries in the array passed into [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/init(viewAnimations:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/viewAnimations].

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
